sentence: The staff was extremely warm and friendly
Location service Walking distance to Royal Street Bourbon for eating drinking and shopping
I ordered room service late one night and the wings were so good
Concierge a big help
The staff at this hotel always exceeds my expectations
It was clean and comfortable over all I had a great stay with great service as usual
We really loved the staff and rooms
All staff we encountered were helpful and pleasant
Location and friendliness of staff along with amenities
We enjoyed this stay because of the view the cleanliness the location and the kindness of the staff
Terrible business service
On our last night there we ordered pizza from room service
Staff did give me a new room after ant problem not resolved and housekeeping did n’t clean room
Calling the front desk no one answered

Just after 11 PM I called to the front desk and the night duty manager Lindsay came up and for two hours until nearly 1 AM in the morning with a young child she took us to 4 additional rooms each of the rooms on different floors the sheets were either dirty and massive urine and stains all over the mattresses the night duty manager pulled over the sheets to show us that the mattresses we were all surprised that each of the beds we were shown were soiled with urine other stains and very dirty very unsanitary and unbearable to even look at
Sensing a mistake I called the front desk and was rather promptly informed that there were no upgrades or alternate rooms
I did not eat on site but there is 24 hour room service

My husband called the service express number only to be told there was a known issue with the water temp and that we would not have hot water that evening but “ hopefully ” it will be resolved by morning
The rooms were overall nice and they give free bottled water but I felt the staff here dropped the ball on so many little things that add to the overall experience
This hotel has a lot of potential they just need more staff
